website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer the drug-free route, consider these child-sized acupressure bands.
pros: Natural choice to prevent motion sickness using acupressure
No drowsiness or other side effects
Works better if in place before the journey begins
cons: Consider using an adult-sized band for children ages 5 and older

customer_reviews.title: Best thing yet!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gets extremely bad motion sickness. She had a 6 hr bus ride for a field trip that was coming up. I bought these to see if they would work as I had no way of giving her, her medicine as I wasn't going on the trip. We tested these out on a 3 hr ride to pick up a friend. She didn't get sick at all. So I sent her to school with them on for her field trip. She got home later that day and I asked her how it went and she never got sick and felt find. Best thing yet!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Kaileiann Sherred

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old was getting car sick almost every time we were in the car for more than 15 minutes. I looked up remedies and came across this. We haven't had any problems since. So... hooray for not puking the car!
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Watch size, these are small!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say these work on my daughter yet but they work on me. That being said, watch the size on these. They are not adjustable - I bought for an average if not taller 6 year old girl (48 lbs, about 47" tall) and these fit but snuggly. Any older kids would never fit the child's "size".
customer_reviews.author: JSWTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: They work great. My 6 year old gets car sick just like me. I found adult sea bands, so when we learned about the problem we went straight for sea bands. I was thrilled with the size fitting so well and the effectiveness was exactly the same. They come with a little plastic case for safe keeping. These truly help with carsickness. They’re stylish like sweatbands, but with the acupressure balls on the inside of the wrist. There are also instructions for how to put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Robsey

customer_reviews.title: Pink and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: First, logistics. Arrived fast and w/ minimal packaging, which I appreciate. Second, effectiveness. I've used wrist bands for many year to tamp down my own travel sickness. My young grandaughter got that gene, unfortunately, and we'd tried using the bands, but without success becasue they were too loose. These fit her skinny 5-yr old wrists well, and it took only a few minutes to teach her how to put them on and find the pressure point. Took a long trip last weekend and it was nausea free!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: These are LIFE CHANGING! My 3 yr old has a very sensitive stomach. She gets carsick within 15min of a car ride. We have to carry bags for any length of time in the car. It was to the point that we were not able to go anywhere. I purchased these and,like magic, no more getting sick on car rides. She even asks for her bracelets. So pleased with these that we ordered a few pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Same size as adults...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 children's seabands thinking they're smaller in size than the adult seabands only to find that they all the same size...
customer_reviews.author: SuJung

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend, just wish they were smaller
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate to get something for my daughter. We do a 35 min commute daily (each way) and she throws up coming and going daily. She is not quite 2 yrs old yet, and I know these are supposed to be for 3 and up, but since I can't give her any medicine, I had to try something. They have helped, and I think if they were smaller, they would help even more. She has very tiny arms, so they are not as tight as they should be. I would recommend, just wish they were smaller...especially these pink ones because they are made for girls, who generally have smaller wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Croftcheck

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect bands arrived- Can’t exchange them
customer_reviews.text: I paid extra to ensure I received the pink bands for my daughter. Instead l received green camouflage bands. It won’t let me return or exchange them for the correct ones. Very disappointed. Didn’t get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 4yo who complains of “stomach hurts” ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4yo who complains of “stomach hurts” almost every time she’s in the car. Seemed to help a little in the beginning and then sometimes she still c/o tommy ache. Not sure how to think of it. The product itself seemed well made. My child loves to wear it in the House too...lol
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Brown

customer_reviews.title: no puke....happy mommy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy alternative for child's motion sickness. I never have been one to pop medicine into my kids, so looked for another option for motion sickness in the long car rides that we have to take to visit family. These have worked well for us! My only problem is remembering to put them on at the beginning of the trip. My 5 yr old hasn't complained about them and forgets she has them on. She loves the pink camo too.
customer_reviews.author: raeleen deanna

customer_reviews.title: Too small for slender 8 yo
customer_reviews.text: These were way too small for my 8 yr old to wear comfortably and she’s small for her age. I’d say they’re made for a 3/4 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Mamax3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, fits my 4 year old daughter's wrist perfectly. Very comfortable- she forgets she's wearing them. So far, no vomiting has happened since she started wearing them. Love the carrying case so they stay together and are easier to find in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: JenJaro

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Brought these on our cruise. Very comfortable to wear. We had previously purchased plastic ones and would not recommend. These are extremely comfortable and can be washed a few times. Held up for the whole week and we washed and stored for our next trip. Also, going to use for extended road trips for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Targin S.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our 3-year-old. They don’t work every time, but seem to help. We also use a half pill of Dramamine. The combo works for us!
customer_reviews.author: MEGFP

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's a placebo or maybe it really works. Either way, we haven't had a car sickness complaint since we started using these with our 3 year old. Before that he was getting nauseous after just a few minutes in the car every time. He does eventually complain about them being uncomfortable, but it usually isn't enough to make him want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Benedek

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know exact size by you can’t return these.
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped was wrong color. We received blue ones not pink. But we would have been ok with that. Then when trying to return item because it was too tight, found out that item could not be returned. I was hoping to get larger size. If I could rate it a zero - I would be we can not use them.
customer_reviews.author: JFM

customer_reviews.title: NOT pink.
customer_reviews.text: The product that arrived was NOT pink, it was a camo blue design. Inaccurate description.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Fit Adult Female 6 inch Wrist - Pretty Design
customer_reviews.text: I am a small boned adult female (6 inch wrist) and they fit perfectly. They are slightly "snug" - which is ideal - because you need them to exert pressure on your wrist in order to work. The swirly pink design made them look a little more like bracelets (and less like tennis sweat bands) than the plain ones - which I liked!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Crane

customer_reviews.title: Sea bands
customer_reviews.text: Great love these things-work for sinuses and allergies within 5-10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Katie P Peacock

customer_reviews.title: They REALLY work!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I didn't think this could possibly work. We bought a pair out of desperation for our daughter's car sickness. She would throw up after any long car trip and even on some much shorter trips. These bands worked immediately! The first time she wore them and every trip since she's worn them, our daughter hasn't been car sick. Also, she really likes wearing them. This most recent purchase is to make sure we're never without a pair of her Sea Bands.
customer_reviews.author: Steve from VA

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my 6 year old who struggled with motion sickness every time she rode in the car
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Khoury

customer_reviews.title: They were too tight and itchy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my 3.5 year old daughter has my motion sickness issues. She gets nauseous every time we get into the car. I got this for her hoping they would help, but they were so tight on her wrist that it was painful for her, not to mention annoying. She couldn't leave them on long enough to tell if they would really work. I got the adult ones and had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fly with no nausea and got so bold on the return from the airport that I looked at my phone while in the back seat and didn't get sick. Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for kids prone to motion/car sickness - they work!
customer_reviews.text: Life saver for roadtrips. Without it, there will be up chucky, with it worn, no problem. For extra strong protection in bumpy switchbacks, add a couple of drops of pure peppermint oil on the wrist band. The only problem is that we keep losing/misplacing them. No matter, we keep buying them, they are that good and make dramamine unnecessary!
customer_reviews.author: Niem And

customer_reviews.title: changed my our lives!
customer_reviews.text: Of my 3 kids, 2 have battled motion sickness in most car trips longer than 30 minutes. Sea Bands worked when other non drug solutions did not. So much so that we have not needed to have any emergency stops due to MS for months. I love this product for how it has transformed my children's lives!
customer_reviews.author: DoraymeTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter who has chronic car-sickness. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who has chronic car-sickness. They seem to be effective as she hasn't complained of being sick, but they irritate her wrists and she has incredibly tiny wrists. Still, 4 stars for achieving what we set out to do.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Stephens

customer_reviews.title: They really did work for us on our cruise. ...
customer_reviews.text: They really did work for us on our cruise. I had a difficult time adjusting and finding my sea legs and these did help. They also help after you are home from a cruise and are experiencing land sickness. I had a difficult time re-adjusting to land and these did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: SFENNER

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these before we had to take a 2-day road trip with my daughter, who has suffered with motion sickness since she was about two. I'm not sure if it's the placebo affect or if they really worked, but she never complained at all when she had them on but complained within an hour if she didn't. I carry them in my purse now.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Dix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! It worked really well and after 1 week ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! It worked really well and after 1 week my daughter was over her motion sickness. Worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Best band for the money .
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 18 month old grandbaby for her first cruise worked like a charm . Would definitely recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: kenya

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old was getting sick in the car almost every time we were going somewhere, no matter the distance. She has been using these for about 2 weeks now and has not gotten sick once. So thankful for no more puking!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for my queasy kid
customer_reviews.text: My grandparents used these years ago to avoid seasickness on their sailboat. Said it worked like a charm. When my 6 year old started getting queasy on long car rides and vomiting occasionally I didn't want to give her medication every time we took a trip, and these came to mind. Have worked great! No carsick feeling on trips, no worries on airplane (she didn't want to go to Disney bc she threw up on a plane and was afraid to ride one till the "magic bracelets" came). We forgot them once- she threw up. In someone else's car. Lesson learned, they live in my purse. She loves them and we trust them!
customer_reviews.author: skmd

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure they Work
customer_reviews.text: Tried for first time today at amusement park for my daughter. They did not seem to help her motion sickness but I have heard great things from trusted sources so we will try again! Recommend giving them a try as I know they do work for some.
customer_reviews.author: Christina McCarte

customer_reviews.title: Works so far
customer_reviews.text: So far no more puking in the car for my one year old while wearing these
customer_reviews.author: lindsay bohney

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why these work, but they do. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why these work, but they do. If it's the placebo effect, I'm okay with it because they stop my 5 year old daughter from throwing up every 15 minute car ride.
customer_reviews.author: kcnewmom

customer_reviews.title: Too uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 6 & 8 year olds to wear on a cruise. Neither could wear longer than an hour as it made deep indentations in their skin - that's even with one of them being very slender. While I get that the concept is "pressure point" based, it also has to be tolerable or maybe that's the plan? Pain distracts you from the motion sickness? Anyway, they were never used again and neither had any issues, thankfully. We are going on another cruise soon and these will not be used.
customer_reviews.author: Doctorbubba

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just recently has become carsick on long car rides. I was looking for something to help her on our 8 hour trip to visit family and i decided to give these a try. They worked like a charm! I was skeptical, but my daughter didn't get sick at all and she loved that the bands were pink :) I would highly recommend these if your little one has trouble riding in the car.
customer_reviews.author: ms_nell

customer_reviews.title: I really thought these were just a gimmick but they ...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought these were just a gimmick but they really do work! Make sure the kid uses his/her own fingers to measure where the band goes.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Winger

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold. My 4 year old daughter has had 4 flights with these since purchasing, and all without any sickness. She doesn't really like wearing them, but she prefers them to getting sick or taking Dramamine.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Works good, and my daughter liked how it looks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our seven year old to wear on a snorkeling/boating trip. It seemed to work in preventing nausea/seasickness, and she loved the pink camo look. Easy to use, and reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Having children who get super car sick. This has helped us so much.
customer_reviews.author: PoshTosh

customer_reviews.title: Works so well with kids for car sickness we have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so well with kids for car sickness we have used all over Asia on crazy roads. Before seabands we used bags that the kids would just be sick in--after sea bands no worries!
customer_reviews.author: matthews

customer_reviews.title: Work as they should and cute
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old gets car sick going 5 minutes down the road. These work like they should and they are cute ta boot!
customer_reviews.author: LuceyLou

customer_reviews.title: I went on a cruise and I got this because ...
customer_reviews.text: I went on a cruise and I got this because I get sea sickness. The bands didn't work for me.... I ended up getting some Ginger Gum when we got off the ship in Puerto Rico.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Only place I have seen the color pink available
customer_reviews.text: This truly works from my preschool daughter who gets carsick!
customer_reviews.author: Ann G. Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderfully for my 3 and 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully for my 3 and 6 year old! Although they complained being a little too snug, but it did keep them from feeling sick on a 3 day cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Betty C.

customer_reviews.title: and the pink is super cute compared top the gray ones you typically find
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my 13 month old. She would get sick constantly in the car, even on short drives. I needed something safe to save me from having to wash chunky milk from her car seat several times in the course of a month. She's been wearing them now for a few weeks and has not thrown up at all...and the pink is super cute compared top the gray ones you typically find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising! You may receive any other color but pink
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because I ordered a pink band since it was advertised as “pink” and ended up receiving a green camouflage one. And to make matters worse, it’s nonrefundable.
customer_reviews.author: StR

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I don't know if they are working because ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I don't know if they are working because my 2 yr old is over her car sickness debacle or what but I am pleased for the price. Worth the try for anyone who is dealing with a sick kid!
customer_reviews.author: Mariella Vilar

customer_reviews.title: Fits young child
customer_reviews.text: Fits my four year old perfectly. Comes with a clear plastic case to keep them in our glove box
customer_reviews.author: lindsey frawley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable.
customer_reviews.text: They are alright. Helps a tad...takes edge off. Pretty durable... Washed few times in machine and are still good.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Arellano

customer_reviews.title: They work/ great price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gets carsick often. This was the best price I found this product for and they help tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders!
customer_reviews.text: These work so well! My daughter would scream the whole car ride until we got these! Worked wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Seratt

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Product Description clearly states ***Pink*** however I just received this item 5 minutes ago and they are BLUE. I went to return them and it says this product can't be returned. STAY AWAY, Complete SCAM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car ride and on the airplane!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I bought one pair for my daughter and another pair for my son. They do not get motion sickness while wearing these. They are great for the car and airplane.
customer_reviews.author: Texasmomof2

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for travel sickeness..
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my 4 year old girl who has travel sickness.she never vomited once after wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Kumaresan Jagadeesan

customer_reviews.title: ...They Worked GREAT for Our Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter worse SEA-BAND anti-nausea wrist-bands, when, as a child she rode in the back seat of the car. They worked great for her in preventing motion-sickness. When her Dad and I heard that her daughter, our little 5-year old granddaughter had experienced motion-sickness during a long car ride on their family vacation, we ordered these for her. Our daughter was thrilled and has packed them away for now, with plans to use them (preventively) on their next long car trip. I am sure they will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This is great my daughter gets car sick and with out the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great my daughter gets car sick and with out the magic bands as we call them we'd be stuck having to stay closer to home!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kreminski

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed motion medication for long car rides. A friend recommended these and they seem to do the trick. She is no longer nauseous when we drive for more than an hour and I don't have to medicate her.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moskov

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for my daughter on our long road trip. I was amazed. No car sickens.
customer_reviews.author: ShelliQ06

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old daughter as she gets sick when we go on long road trips. Since using these she hasn't got sick. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: TheSteadyHand

customer_reviews.title: my daughter gets motion sickness very easily, even on short car trips
customer_reviews.text: my daughter gets motion sickness very easily, even on short car trips. these have been invaluable. the only time she has gotten sick in the car since having them was when she took them off while we were driving. when i ordered i was worried the sizing might not be right since she is a petite 2 year old, but it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect if you are an adult with small wrists with motion sickness,
customer_reviews.author: Kalia

customer_reviews.title: These are really helpful! I keep them in the car.
customer_reviews.text: These sea bands really work to control motion sickness. We use them in the car and on planes for both of our children. I got a pair for myself too (in the adult size). I have a friend who used them during her first trimester of pregnancy, and she says that they actually stopped her morning sickness! If you get these, devise a strategy to be sure that your kids always give them back to you or put them in a safe place when they remove them, however. My children have each lost 2 pairs, and it is expensive to keep replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Little girl Very Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Very upset!! I ordered kids pink and camouflage came in the PINK BOX! How do you get a little girl to wear camouflage with her cutie pink outfits??? Any other color might have worked, except CAMOUFLAGE! Really?!?! I leave Wednesday for our cruise😔 Today is Sunday.....
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These wristbands are awesome. My daughter gets carsick and these are the only things that seem to help her at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbs49

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I found these years ago and they work great for me. My granddaughter now suffers from motion sickness and I ordered these for her.
customer_reviews.author: densieb

customer_reviews.title: We got these items in a timely fashion and they ...
customer_reviews.text: We got these items in a timely fashion and they really do work are 2 1/2-year-old granddaughter can make a car ride without throwing up
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: They're easy to keep in the car and use when needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has worn them twice now, and they seem to work for her. They're easy to keep in the car and use when needed.
customer_reviews.author: shoes222

customer_reviews.title: T
customer_reviews.text: Just came back from a cruise and fortunately didn't need to use these bands more than once. However, when the boat was rocking that first night it really helped my kids and myself. Within 20 mins didn't notice the swaying anything. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Brian C Frerking

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 yr old daughther after we figured out she was getting motion sick on the school bus. I put them on her in the morning & her teacher makes sure she is wearing them for the bus ride home. Since she started wearing them we havent had any problems at all with the motion sickness & she thinks they look cool! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: LinneyNRyMom

customer_reviews.title: These area wonderful. My 5 year old granddaughter gets carsick and ...
customer_reviews.text: These area wonderful. My 5 year old granddaughter gets carsick and a friend recommended these. My granddaughter will not get in the car without them now!!!! No more sickness. Recommend highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Phillips

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless on my kids. Pediatric Dramamine worked the best; if you do not mind medication for kids.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color Received
customer_reviews.text: Sea Bands are fine as a product, but I ordered pink and received green camouflage. My daughter and I both think that they are pretty unattractive and she doesn't want to wear them. :(
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: Great way to cure motion sickness without meds
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was complaining of her tummy and head hurting when driving in the car and when playing Minecraft on the Xbox. We tried this out and no more complaints! Great way to cure motion sickness without meds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work for car sickness
customer_reviews.text: I think these may have worked! My 2 year old has started getting car sick recently so I purchased these "bracelets" and no more vomiting in the car! It may be coincidence but, I'm not ready to abandon these yet to find out. She complained about them after keeping them on for a long car ride but generally leaves them on without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My 5 year old daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 5 year old daughter loves these! She has motion sickness and these bands make her feel comfortable while driving! They work on me, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to say that my daughter didn't appear to even ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical that a wristband with a plastic bead could do anything to conquer motion sickness, but after taking a plane ride from the Midwest to the West Coast and witnessing my daughter get sick over and over again during takeoff, turbulence and landing, we got desperate and ordered some to be shipped to where we were staying on vacation. I'm happy to say that my daughter didn't appear to even get the slightest bit sick on the flight home. This is the best $8 I ever spent, and I'm just upset I didn't buy these before we began the trip instead!
customer_reviews.author: bispymusic

customer_reviews.title: I am not reviewing their efficacy... these ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not reviewing their efficacy... these bands are marketed for children, so I assumed they would be a smaller size. Do not pay double price, because they are the same as adult size. Very speedy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my 7month old and 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Black Fam

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very disappointed. The product does seems to work for her ...
customer_reviews.text: These were listed as pink but the ones I received in the mail were military green. My daughter was very disappointed. The product does seems to work for her car sickness.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Odenwalder

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2 year old who often got carsick when we drive further than 5 miles. Since purchasing these bands, she hasn't gotten car sick. My wife heard about them from a friend of hers - I don't know much about them. So I can't tell you if it's coincidence or proof that they work. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for nausea
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my daughter when she rides in the car.
customer_reviews.author: SKelley

customer_reviews.title: So... my 2 year old daughter suffer ...
customer_reviews.text: So... my 2 year old daughter suffer motion sickness. Because we have to ride to school in the morning I had to find a way for her not vomit (she was vomiting at least 50% of the time) I tried this and now it is rare when she has some accidents, if there is extreme traffic she will vomit but normally she wont vomit when she wears her "pinkies"... I wish I knew of this when I was pregnant
customer_reviews.author: CarmenF

customer_reviews.title: Even better to have children sizes available
customer_reviews.text: These always work when traveling with the children. Even better to have children sizes available.
customer_reviews.author: JPad

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for motion sickness
customer_reviews.text: As a lifelong sufferer of immediate and severe motion sickness (even some movies cause a problem), these bands are a life saver! They are my "magic wristbands". If you don't get relief the first time you use them, try a different placement. The directions indicate placing below 2 fingers width on your wrist but I place my directly at the wrist crease and that works for me. And these are much cuter than the plain gray bands I've had for years!
customer_reviews.author: caligirl42

customer_reviews.title: Helped w/ car sickness
customer_reviews.text: Have a child who suffers from car sickness. We were going to vacation in the smokies and I wanted to get her something that would allow her to enjoy a book in the car or avoid feeling sick while navigating the GSM park. She claims they work great and doesn't have any affects. Not 100% on the science behind it but even if she's only convinced herself they work, well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: MattDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works wonder with my 6 year old. She's very happy now that she does not get dizzy anywhere. thanks. :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Marin

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for car rides!
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully. My seven year old daughter just started to feel queasy in the car recently. She has worn these now on two 6.5 hour rides, and four 2.5 hour rides in the car, as well as a 3 hour whale watch boat ride. She did not feel sick a single bit.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a deep sea fishing trip and the water was very ruff due to storms. My daughter never felt woozy in any way even though half the people on board were in the cabin giving it all they had. My daughter felt sorry for a little boy that was also sick and gave him one of her bands, within 20 min he was fine and they were playing and laughing the rest of the trip like long lost friends.
customer_reviews.author: GinnyGillin G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working well for the 18 month old who gets carsick.
customer_reviews.author: Marian E. Breive

customer_reviews.title: she was so happy when we landed and she felt perfect
customer_reviews.text: it worked for my daughter, she was so happy when we landed and she felt perfect! made the flight to FL a success!
customer_reviews.author: WILL-T

customer_reviews.title: So far work great for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: So far work great for my granddaughter. She hasn't gotten sick in the car since using them - but only a handful of times so far - she's only 18 mos. old so we thought the challenge would be keeping them on her but she likes her "bracelets".
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for motion sickness! My children and I put them on before car trips, they work beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to find an alternative to giving her Dramamine every time we got the car so I ordered these and couldn't be happier. They are so cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yr old daughter started getting carsick on longer car trips. I wanted to find an alternative to giving her Dramamine every time we got the car so I ordered these and couldn't be happier. They are so cute, they are comfortable when she wears them and we have not had an accident in the car since we got them. My son even wanted a pair so now every time we get in the car and go on the highway they pull out the handy little plastic case and each put on their wristbands! Tell everyone about these!
customer_reviews.author: Kmarshall

customer_reviews.title: Life Savers
customer_reviews.text: I come from a very dizzy family. We need these to go on rides at amusement parks! And they are life savers! My kids love them and can put them on themselves. They come in cute colors for them, and cases to keep them together. They will hurt after a little while, but that goes away. Great product for the whole family! (They're also great for pregnancy nausea!)
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Nikki

customer_reviews.title: These are a life saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My 2 year old daughter has yet to get car sick while wearing these bands. We used to use medication with hit or miss results. We just took a 12+ hour trip and all went well with her wearing these. We won't drive anywhere without these now.
customer_reviews.author: ABCE's Dad

customer_reviews.title: I think it worked
customer_reviews.text: I can say this: first flight with our child, she got sick while in the air. 2 years later, another flight and we tried these bands. She did NOT get sick. She did NOT even complain of any nausea, and the flight was perfectly fine. I do not KNOW if it was Seabands that did the trick, but so wouldn't fly without them again.
customer_reviews.author: Fermata

customer_reviews.title: My child was sick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our first cruise. My child was sick and had the bracelet on all day. It may work for some people, but it did not work for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Lady

product_meta.title: Sea Band Child Wrist - One Pair *** Pink ***
